TopicTitle: are there any working planets mods in .24?

Articles.Content:
ive searched through every single one it seems and they all rely on krags planet factory which has not been updated.

even when they say it works in .24 and I install it with krags its still a big mess of missing textures and certain planets looking like a disaster at the fanblade factory. half also seem to resemble bloody cottonballs as they have a solid red and white gradient instaid of a texture and look positively nauseating.

anyone managed to get them working?
There is a mod called Kopernicus (I think) being worked on that will replace Planet factory-but it's not done yet
Planet factory does not work in 64 bit sadly.

I've had a look at Kerbal Universe, and while I can understand that some people just want tons and tons of planets, I decided not to download the pack simply because the planets don't even look that interesting or detailed. They look nice from orbit, but when you land on them, most of them are quite flat and boring. I'm just speaking from viewing what other people have done though, since as I said, I haven't downloaded the pack. For me, I'd much prefer to have less but more detailed planets, than more, lower quality planets.

I would bet on Kopernicus being a good replacement for Krag's Planet Factory when it's completed though, as randomness5555 said above.

Planet factory does not work in 64 bit sadly.

It doesn't? Strange.... It's working for me.....
